welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Weybridge, a charming town nestled in the beautiful countryside of the United Kingdom. Known for its quaint shops, lovely parks, and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a memorable stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal, opened in 2014 and serving mainly European and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The primary hub for long-haul flights, serving many international destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal, serving mainly long-haul flights for SkyTeam alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal, serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited usage and no time limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and charter flights at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: A small but busy terminal serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
